article.title: Raytheon Continues X-Band Radar Support Under Nearly $43 Million Modification
article.author: George Seffers
article.text: Raytheon Company Integrated Defense Systems, Woburn, Massachusetts, is being awarded a contract modification for nearly $43 million to continue software maintenance in support of the AN/TYP-2 X-Band Radar. The Missile Defense Agency is the contracting activity.
